name: Violent Restaurant (Early Access)
description:
Wanted to shoot some gangsters (In a Top - Down, 2D, Survival, Shooter restaurant)? Well now you can in Violent Restaurant. Shoot gangsters and some robots that you can only kill with a grenade. This is an early access game and will receive updates. You must be at least 13 years old in order to play this game.

Enjoy!

Team 3xtracted Games!

Controls:

Move - WASD

Shoot - Left Click (Hold)

Throw Grenades - Right Click

Aim - Mouse
